title: The Chronicles of Frank King: Mentor of Might

story.text: Frank King discovers he can manipulate time after helping a younger student learn complex calculus. He vows to use this newfound power wisely.
Testing his powers, Frank pauses time to prevent a street accident. Surprised by his abilities' range, he decides to refine his control.
Frank mentors a group of kids in a tech bootcamp. Using his powers, he stretches moments to give detailed explanations and instill deeper understanding.
A dilemma arises; news of a bank heist reaches Frank as he tutors. He freezes time, thwarts the heist, and returns, unseen yet exhausted from the strain.
Local news hints at a mysterious 'Timekeeper' safeguarding the city. Frank smiles, realizing his dual life of mentor and superhero has only begun.
Frank meets an elderly sage who senses his capability, warning him of the burden of power and offering guidance to balance his dual roles effectively.
Frank spends the day reflecting and practicing, determined to master his powers without neglecting his passion for mentoring and leading by example.

ending: Thus, Frank King continued his journey, one second at a time, mentoring as a hero and a scholar.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility; even heroes need guidance.
